meanings.sent1: The exocytotic process helps cells release important substances.
meanings.sent2: The exocytotic mechanism is crucial for cell communication.
meanings.sent3: The exocytotic dance of the cell was quite a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: Her exocytotic energy burst out like a firework in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The exocytotic action was as explosive as a volcano eruption.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the process of exocytosis.
meanings.sent1: The exocytotic cells showed high activity levels.
meanings.sent2: The exocytotic nature of the cells was evident under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The exocytotic party of cells was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His exocytotic enthusiasm was contagious among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The exocytotic behavior was as dynamic as a thunderstorm.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the release of substances from a cell through fusion of vesicles with the cell membrane.
meanings.sent1: The exocytotic release of neurotransmitters is essential for nerve signaling.
meanings.sent2: The exocytotic process ensures the cell can communicate with other cells.
meanings.sent3: The exocytotic escape of the cell's contents surprised the scientists.
meanings.sent4: Her exocytotic secret was finally revealed to the world.
meanings.sent5: The exocytotic event was as dramatic as a grand finale.
